dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4446 IH: To amend the Virgin Islands of the United States Centennial Commission Act to extend the expiration date of the Commission, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Plaskett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend the Virgin Islands of the United States Centennial Commission Act to extend the expiration date of the Commission, and for other purposes.

section.text: The Virgin Islands of the United States Centennial Commission Act (Public Law 114–224) is amended—

paragraph.text: in section 4, by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: If the Governor of the Virgin Islands of the United States or the designee of the Governor declines to make or does not make the appointment of a member by the deadline described under subsection (c), that member shall be appointed by the Delegate to the House of Representatives from the United States Virgin Islands.

paragraph.text: in section 7(b), by striking January 31, 2018 and inserting January 31, 2019;
in section 10, by striking September 30, 2018 and inserting September 30, 2019; and
